# CGFLOAT_MIN | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Core Foundation ](/documentation/corefoundation)

- [ CGFLOAT_MIN ](/documentation/corefoundation/cgfloat_min)

-  CGFLOAT_MIN 

Global Variable# CGFLOAT_MIN

iOSiPadOSMac CatalystmacOStvOSvisionOSwatchOS

```
var CGFLOAT_MIN: Double { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/corefoundation/cgfloat_min#Discussion)

The minimum non-negative non-subnormal value for a [`CGFloat`](/documentation/corefoundation/cgfloat-swift.struct) type. For 32-bit code, this value is `1.17549435e-38F`. For 64-bit code, it is `2.2250738585072014e-308`.

## [See Also](/documentation/corefoundation/cgfloat_min#see-also)

### [Constants](/documentation/corefoundation/cgfloat_min#Constants)

[`var CFByteOrderBigEndian: __CFByteOrder`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfbyteorderbigendian)Multi-byte values are stored with the most-significant bytes stored first. PowerPC CPUs are big endian.[`var CFByteOrderLittleEndian: __CFByteOrder`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfbyteorderlittleendian)Multi-byte values are stored with the least-significant bytes stored first.
